Methodologies: Quantitative measurement of urea via enzymatic hydrolysis and NADH conversion
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thermo Fisher Scientific Oy Urea/BUN assay with associated calibrator (sCal) and controls (Nortrol, Abtrol) for quantitative urea/BUN measurement on T60 platforms
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative in vitro diagnostic measurement of urea/BUN (urea nitrogen) concentration in human serum or plasma for diagnosis and treatment of certain renal and metabolic diseases, with calibrator and controls for quality assurance on T60 instrument.
